name: Department of Computer Science and Engineering
description: The Department of Computer Science and Engineering aims at producing technically competent professionals who can excel in today’s age of technology. Recognizing its role in engineering education, generation, and dissemination, the department is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities and relevant technologies. Computer Science or Computing Science is the scientific and mathematical approach to computation, specifically referring to the design of computing machines and processes.
vision: To emerge as a world-class institution in engineering education and research, contributing to societal development and sustainable growth.
mission: Impart quality education to produce competent engineers with a strong theoretical foundation and practical skills.
Promote research and innovation in collaboration with industries and academia.
Cultivate ethical values, leadership qualities, and a spirit of entrepreneurship among students.
Contribute to the socio-economic development of the region through technology transfer and community engagement.
courses_offered: B.Tech.Artificial Intelligence And Data Science (FULL TIME)

facility.name: Python Laboratory
description: In a Python programming laboratory at a college, students learn to write, test, and debug Python programs.
They explore conditionals, loops, and functions for structuring their code.
Additionally, they gain proficiency in handling compound data using Python lists, tuples, and dictionaries, as well as reading and writing data from/to files.
The lab aims to equip students with practical programming skills and a solid foundation in Python.

facility.name: Database Laboratory
description: In a college database management laboratory, students gain foundational knowledge in database concepts, technology, and practice.
They learn SQL programming through various database problems, develop applications using front-end tools, and work with back-end DBMS.

The lab covers topics such as data definition languages (DDL), data manipulation language (DML) commands, high-level programming language extensions, front-end tools, forms, triggers, menu design, reports, and practical exercises using open-source software like MySQL.

facility.name: IDEA Laboratory
description: The AICTE-IDEA (Idea Development, Evaluation & Application) Lab is established in AICTE-approved institutions to encourage students to apply science, technology, engineering, and mathematics (STEM) fundamentals. This lab provides hands-on experience, fosters creativity, and trains students in critical thinking, problem-solving, and collaboration.
The IDEA Lab aims to transform education by converting ideas into prototypes, promoting imaginative thinking, and preparing graduates for the 21st-century workplace.

facility.name: Cybersecurity Laboratory
description: A college cybersecurity lab is a hands-on learning environment equipped with simulated networks and security tools.
Students practice ethical hacking techniques, analyze malware, and defend against cyberattacks in a safe space.
These labs, often led by cybersecurity professors, prepare students for industry certifications and careers in information security.

name: Mechanical Engineering
description: The Department of Mechanical Engineering was established in the year 2007 with undergraduate (UG) programmes, followed by the introduction of postgraduate (PG) programmes. The team comprises potential faculty and administrative personnel dedicated to the conduct of programmes and the establishment of various laboratories to ensure smooth and efficient departmental operations. The main objective of the department is to create a highly skilled and dedicated workforce capable of facing global challenges.
vision: The Department of Mechanical Engineering strives to be globally renowned for outstanding technical education and research leading to highly-qualified ethical engineers, who are innovative, entrepreneurial and successful in advanced fields of engineering and research.
mission: Through professionalism in teaching, instill the spirit of commitment and problem-solving methodologies.
To bring up highly qualified ethical mechanical engineers and build leadership qualities.
Provide service to society through contribution of ideas for projects and carrying out research for the benefit and development of the community.
Foster freedom of opinion for sharing knowledge and information.

name: MBA - Masters of Business Administration
description: The Department offers Master of Business Administration (MBA) course at Anna University Regional Campus Coimbatore as a four-semester regular programme spread over two academic years. The course structure is designed to impart knowledge in areas of specialization, viz. Marketing, Human Resource, Finance, Systems, and Production specializations. The department has two aims: to increase the understanding of the factors which influence the conduct of organizations and to offer students the tools and techniques which they may use to navigate organizational life.
vision: The Department strives to provide a stimulating environment for learning, to maximize individual potential, and empower students to meet the challenges of their dynamic environment.
mission: Our mission is to disseminate managerial expertise by developing human resources to meet the country's entrepreneurial and workforce needs with an adaptive approach to our cultural, ethical, and professional norms.
courses_offered: Ph.D.,(FULL TIME and PART TIME mode)

name: Department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering
description: The Department aims to impart the Students a learning Experience in understanding the fundamental concepts of Electrical & Electronics Engineering built on the Foundation of Science, Mathematics, Computing and Technology by active learning process with dedicated faculty members and extensive laboratory facilities so as to prepare them for their Professional Careers. It also prepares the  students to meet the growing global challenges of Engineering Industries by educating them to become highly professional Electrical and Electronics Engineers of high ethics. The Department produces highly qualified Engineers not only to meet the Global environment but also to build a developed nation.
vision: To be a centre of excellence by imparting quality teaching, carrying out effective research and technology development in frontier areas of Electrical and Electronics Engineering.
mission: To empower students and professionals with state-of-art knowledge and technological skills in Electrical and Electronics Engineering.
To enrich the students to possess the ability and passion to work wisely, creatively, and effectively for the benefit of society.
To enable Industries to adopt effective solutions in thrust areas of electrical engineering through research and consultancy.
To be a place for innovation and technology development in growing areas of Electrical and Electronics Engineering.

achievements.event: The Department of EEE with its facilities has placed 70% of students in respective batches in various core and IT industries and as well in educational sectors.
The Department has produced 15 PhD candidates with the guidance of 2 research supervisors over a period of 8 years.
The Department has conducted 4 FDP's in the undergraduate subjects to enhance the technical expertise of the faculty handling those subjects
The Department has organized 12 workshops in the growing machine learning techniques wherein several research scholars working in this research area has been benefitted.

Three National Conferences have been organized with funding from AICTE,BRNS,DRDO,ISRO and AERB.These conferences have paved way for the presentation of research contributions of the scholars and interactions with key note speakers and session chairs has made the participants aware if the emerging trends.
Numerous industrial related projects have been carried out by full time and part time students.
The Post graduate students actively have published their project work contributions in referred National and International journals.
The postgraduate students underwent inplant training to NLC thermal power plants, Hydro POwer Stations, L&T Switch gear Training centre,Suzlon Pvt.Ltd. and ZF Wind Power Pvt. Ltd.

description: The Department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering established with an aim to spearhead the installation of world class technologically advanced and highly sophisticated laboratories like Electrical Machines laboratory, Power Electronics laboratory ,Electric Circuits laboratory, Control Systems laboratory, Measurements and Instrumentations laboratory, Process Control laboratory and Modeling and Simulation laboratory.
The department provides software's like MATLAB R14,NI Lab VIEW,PSIM,NI Multi Sim, Active HDL and Process Control Simulator to enrich the students in their modeling and simulation skills.
A Laboratory has been set up to utilize the free open source software (FOSS) posted-which includes SCILAB and ESIM.

assistant_professors.name: Dr. T. Aruldoss Albert Victoire
achievements: Dr. Albert received the B.Tech. degree from Pondicherry University, Pondicherry, India, the M.E. degree from Madurai Kamaraj University, Madurai, India, and the Ph.D. degree from Anna University, Chennai, India, in 1998, 2000, and 2005, respectively, all in electrical engineering.

education.institution: National Chiao Tsung University,Hsinchu,Taiwan,Republic of China

professional_experience.institution: University VOC College of Engineering Thoothukudi
SVC COLLEGE OF ENGINEERING AND TECHNOLOGY, TIRUNELVELI
UNIVERSITY VOC COLLEGE OF ENGINEERING THOOTHUKUDI

assistant_professors.name: Dr. L. Sheela
achievements: Had very rich experience in the field of Electronics.

scope: The Department aims to impart the Students a learning Experience in understanding the fundamental concepts of Electrical & Electronics Engineering built on the Foundation of Science, Mathematics, Computing and Technology by active learning process with dedicated faculty members and extensive laboratory facilities so as to prepare them for their Professional Careers.

It also prepares the students to meet the growing global challenges of Engineering Industries by educating them to become highly professional Electrical and Electronics Engineers of high ethics. The Department produces highly qualified Engineers not only to meet the Global environment but also to build a developed nation.
projects: 1. Voltage tracking control using fuzzy Pi controller
2. Fault detection and isolation for PPC
3. An approach to plaque characterization using SVM classifier
4. Design and application of testing of electronic equipment on networked virtual instruments
5. Increase DG Insertion in electrical distribution systems by reducing line losses
6. Power quality improvement for grid connected wind energy system using PID tuned STATCOM
7. A fuzzy-optimization approach for generation scheduling with wind and solar energy systems
8. Direct Current Vector Control of PMSG based Wind Energy Conversion System
9. Analyzing the impact on insulated dipole antenna in human body tissues
10. Design of Bridgeless CUK converter for power factor correction
11. Mobile phone radiation analysis in human brain
12. Control of hybrid system using multi-input inverter and maximum power point tracking
research_areas: Modern Control Theory and its applications
Applications of ANN and Fuzzy Logic
Application of Power Electronics to Power Quality Improvement and Industrial Drives
Simulation of Power Electronic Converters and Drives Systems
industry_interaction: Strong industry interaction with involvement in state-of-the-art product development
faculty_encouragement: Encouragement for faculties to take independent initiatives with collective responsibility in relevant academic and R&D dimensions.

name: Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering
description: The Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering was established in the year 2007. The Department offers UG Programme and two year PG Programme. The Department is equipped with excellent infrastructure and state of the art equipment to explore the technological challenges in the areas of Electronics, Communication Networks, VLSI design, Signal Processing, Image Processing, ASIC Design, RF Design and Digital system design.
vision: To create an educational environment in which students are prepared to meet the challenges of modern Industrial society by equipping them with: Up to date Technical Knowledge. Analytical and Practical skills. A creative and innovative approach to work.
mission: To develop a strong centre of excellence for education and research with excellent infrastructure.
To impart quality education and technical skills to enable the students to satisfy the industrial requirements.
courses_offered: B.E. ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING (VLSI DESIGN AND TECHNOLOGY)

achievements.event: Established Altera FPGA Lab in the Department of ECE by creating Memorandum of Understanding with ALTERA Corporation, USA at the cost of Rs.12.00 Lakhs.
Established TI MSP430 Microcontroller Lab in the Department of ECE by creating Memorandum of Understanding with TEXAS Instruments, India at the cost of Rs.1.00 Lakh.
Established Analog System Design Lab (ASLK) Lab in the Department of ECE by creating Memorandum of Understanding with TEXAS Instruments, India at the cost of Rs.1.00 Lakh.

facility.name: Applied Electronics laboratory
description: The Applied Electronics Lab is equipped with MSP 430 Microcontroller, Beagle bone black board, MSP 430 F2013 starter kit, TMS320C 6678 Multicore DSP Processor Kit and Application boards for implementing both basic and advanced experiments. In addition to that the Lab is equipped with state of equipments which include 20 Workbenches each consisting of inbuilt CRO, Function Generator, RPS, Ammeters and Voltmeters. Also 10 Desktop Computers have been interfaced with the Workbenches and they are loaded with EDA tool like MultiSim.

scope.description: To create a centre of Excellence in the area of RF and Wireless Communications, Advanced Digital Image Processing, VLSI Design, and Embedded System Design.
objectives: To establish world-class laboratories towards research activities.
To carry out socially relevant projects for the benefit of society.
To provide affordable technical education to the young generation.
To undertake collaborative projects with leading industries and institutions, which offer opportunities for long-term interaction, training, and placement for the benefit of students.

courses offered: B.E. ELECTRONICS AND COMMUNICATION ENGINEERING (FULL TIME)
M.E-VLSI DESIGN AND EMBEDDED SYSTEMS (FULL TIME)
projects: Accurate Fall Accident Detection And Positioning System Using Smart Phone.
Design And Implementation of Automatic Irrigation System Using Smart Phone In Agricultural-field.
VLSI architecture for Efficient Weighted Average Filter for Image denoising.
Design of Efficient Modified Booth Multiplier Using Non-Redundant Radix-4Signed Digit Encoding.

Recognition of Handwritten digits and Tamil Font Using Static and Dynamic Extraction.
Face Recognition and Artists Style Identification in Ancient Portrait Arts.
An Intelligent Vehicle Theft Deduction System and Tracking.
An Implementation of Intelligent Passenger Safety and Monitoring the Driver Behaviour and Driving Condition On Call Taxi and Traveller Vehicle.
A Novel two Fold State Skip logic Built-in-self Test Scheme For Digital Circuits.
Real-Time Traffic Light Control Model for Reducing Vehicles CO2 Emission.
Multiple Description Transform Coded Image Transmission Through MIMO-OFDM.

Image Denoising and Resolution Enhancement for Medical Image Using DTCWT and SVD.
